ComicInfo.Summary:
Judge Anderson tracks Gargarax to a church in the Undercity where his minions are trying to open a portal.
Blue finds out the people on the outer world left them behind 5 years earlier.
Ghost bikers attack during a freak thunderstorm.
Micky Swift is thought to be "The True Jobhunter" and is given "The Job".
